title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7008.2 - Visiting area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7008.2 - Visiting area

State Regulations
(a) A visiting
area of sufficient size to meet the requirements of this Part shall be
established and maintained in each facility. (b) The visiting area shall be designed so as
to allow physical contact between prisoners and their visitors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7008.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
